text: KAYV (97.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Crested Butte, Colorado. The station is owned by Arkansas Valley Broadcasting, Inc. It airs a classic rock format. The station was assigned the KAYV call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on September 22, 2011. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * AYV Category:Radio stations established in 2012 Category:2012 establishments in Colorado Category:Classic rock radio stations in the United States Category:Gunnison County, Colorado
title: KAYV
